EmailTemplate.name: Honda Layout - Warranty Information - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Warranty Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Warranty Information
Thank you for giving us the opportunity to answer your Warranty related question. Please accept this message as confirmation that your email has been received, and allow us two business days to respond.
If you require the information sooner you can visit your local Honda Canada dealership, or call our toll-free line at 1-888-9HONDA9.
For vehicles manufactured in 2002 or newer, you can view the Honda standard warranty at our following web site:
http://www.honda.ca/owners/warranty/standard-warranty
Have a terrific day!
The Customer Relations Team
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link.
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy.
You are receiving this email because you have asked us to notify you about Honda products and promotions. You are subscribed as [% member:email %]. To unsubscribe, please follow this Unsubscribe link.
Â© {!YEAR(TODAY())} Honda Canada. 180 Honda Boulevard, Markham, ON, L6C 0H9, 1-888-946-6329
All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
